item.title: More European Cities (Greece) v1.0 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 24, 2025

More European Cities (Greece) v1.0 1.54 ETS2

This edition lets you activate 55 decorative towns across the Greece created by SCS Software.
Dozens of new cities to enhance your gaming experience in Europe!
Improved gameplay: revamped delivery points and new opportunities!
A more immersive journey through Europe!
A future series of flexible mods!

Compatibility: 1.54

Credits: MyGodness

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Russian Open Spaces – Project Russia,M12-Vostok,NNMap,MRM+Kovylkino RC v1.0 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 24, 2025

Russian Open Spaces – Project Russia,M12-Vostok,NNMap,MRM+Kovylkino RC v1.0 1.54 ETS2

This modification restores and connects Russian Open Spaces territories with M12-Vostok, Project Russia, NNMap, More Russia Map maps with Kovylkino Map addon.

Loading Order:
Russian Open Spaces – Project Russia,M12-Vostok,NNMap,MRM+Kovylkino Road Connection
M12_Vostok
Project Russia – Russian Open Spaces Road Connection
Project Russia – Rusmap Aldimator RC(Если используется Rusmap от Алдиматора)
Project Russia – Rusmap Aldimator Fix(Если используется Rusmap от Алдиматора)
Project Russia Fix
Project Russia Files
Kovylkino Fix
Kovylkino Map
More Russia Map NNmap RC
More Russia Map
NNMap
Russian Open Spaces
Rusmap Files(VK or Aldimator)

Credits: Lyonzyi_Leonid5

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. item.title: Signs on Your Truck and Trailer v1.0.6.30 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 24, 2025

Signs on Your Truck and Trailer v1.0.6.30 1.55 ETS2

Changelog: 1.0.6.30
Iveco S Way corrected location of “B” front sign
Not displaying the cargo load on the Krone Boxliner trailer
Corrected location with stickers on cabs of Volvo FH16 2012 trucks
For Volvo FH16 2012 trucks, company logo stickers were added
Minor bugs fixed
Correction sii file
Correction text file

Description:
The recommended version of the game: 1.54-1.55.*
The mod is represented signs marking trucks in different categories country codes, speed limit, warning, ecology warning and others.

Features Mod:
– Adds about 400 signs for truck tuning
– Works with all stock trucks and some mods
– Compatible also and with trailers

Credits: tobrago

item.title: Scania r lg v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 24, 2025

Scania r lg v1.0 ETS2

It sounds like you’re interested in a Scania R LG mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2). “LG” in this context often refers to “LGMods,” a creator or group known for making high-quality truck mods, particularly for Scania trucks, in ETS2.

These mods usually aim to enhance the default Scania R series trucks in the game by adding more customization options, realistic details, updated interiors, and sometimes even unique engine sounds.

What to Expect from a Scania R LG Mod
A Scania R LG mod would typically offer:
Expanded Customization: More options for chassis, cabins (including high and low roofs), engines, transmissions, and various tuning parts like bumpers, grilles, lights, and side skirts.
Improved Visuals: Higher-resolution textures, more detailed 3D models, and sometimes custom paint jobs or liveries.
Realistic Sounds: Many truck mods include custom sound packs that replicate the real-life engine sounds of the Scania R, especially the iconic V8 engines.
Compatibility: Most good mods are designed to be compatible with the latest version of ETS2 and often with other popular mods like interior accessories or custom trailers.
Standalone or Rework: Some mods are standalone, meaning they add a completely new truck to the dealer, while others might be a “rework” that enhances the existing in-game Scania R.

How to Install Truck Mods in ETS2
Installing truck mods in ETS2 is a straightforward process. Here’s how to do it:

Download the Mod File:
Find and download the Scania R LG mod. It will typically be a .scs file. If it’s a .zip or .rar archive, you’ll need to extract the .scs file(s) from it using a program like WinRAR or 7-Zip.

Locate Your ETS2 Mod Folder:
Go to your Documents folder on your computer.
Inside, you’ll find a folder named “Euro Truck Simulator 2”.
Within that folder, there should be a “mod” folder. If it doesn’t exist, simply create a new folder and name it mod (all lowercase).

Place the Mod File:
Copy the downloaded .scs file(s) into the “mod” folder. If the mod has multiple .scs files (e.g., one for the truck, one for sounds), place all of them in this folder.

Activate the Mod in Game:
Launch Euro Truck Simulator 2.
From the main menu (before loading your profile), click on “Mod Manager”.
On the left side, you’ll see a list of available mods. Find your Scania R LG mod.
Double-click on the mod, or select it and click the right-pointing arrow to move it to the “Active Mods” list on the right.
Check Mod Priority: Some mods require a specific loading order to function correctly or avoid conflicts. Always read the mod’s description for recommended priority settings. Generally, truck mods should be given a higher priority than, for example, map mods.
After activating, click “Confirm Changes”.
Purchase and Drive the Truck:

Load your game profile.
Go to any Scania Truck Dealer or the “Mod Dealer” (if the mod is standalone and appears there) in the game.
Locate the Scania R from the mod, purchase it, customize it, and you’re ready to drive!
Enjoy your enhanced Scania R driving experience in Euro Truck Simulator 2!

Credits: LG

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
